item.description:
NEW STUFF:
The movie starts at 8:00, so we'll meet right inside the theater doors (or right outside if it's nice out) at 7:30. Please call me if you're going to be late.

Also, please keep your RSVP up to date, so I know who to expect and wait for.

Thanks and see you Wednesday!

--Dana


OLD STUFF:
It's been a while... I've been terribly busy (both good and bad stuff), but I wanna go see the early summer blockbusters, so I'm off my duff and scheduling away! (Didja miss me? Can you pretend that you noticed I was dark for a while? )

Let's see how the tough guy with a big heart got his metallic skeleton -- Wolverine, both scary and kind of a heartthrob. X-Men Origins is a series (rumor has it they're making or have just finished making one about Magneto....ooooo!) that predates (chronologically per the story) the X-Men trilogy we all know and love. We all do know and love it, right? Right?! I don't think you need to have seen the trilogy to love this one, but it will probably help.

Summary:
"X-Men Origins: Wolverine" tells the story of Wolverine's epically violent and romantic past, his complex relationship with Victor Creed, and the ominous Weapon X program. Along the way, Wolverine encounters many mutants, both familiar and new, including surprise appearances by several legends of the X-Men universe.

The usual stuff:
We'll meet inside the theater doors (or outside if it's nice out) and then I can buy us all discounted tickets ($8.50 each for FMM members and their guests). I also have $3 vouchers each for small sodas and small popcorns (can be used towards a larger size). As always, guests are welcome, just be sure to include them in the RSVP so that I know who/how many to expect.

Please keep your RSVP as up-to-date as possible. And please call me if you're going to be late or need to change your RSVP after I close RSVPs on the site (2 hours before we meet). My cell is: 508/308-4897. I'm also good for directions if you get lost.

After the movie, we'll head to Fridays (I'll bring the coupons!) to chat about the movie (and just chat).

Hope to see you for X-Men Origins: Wolverine!

--Dana
item.name: X-Men Origins: Wolverine
